alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 01 at 3:01AM MST until December 02 at 10:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Lower Yampa River Basin and Central Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...From this evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin
